comments.body: Quote from: ElySantoss on April 12, 2023, 06:02:12 PMHello,Is there a forecast for an exchange/listing on an exchange?We are looking into a few exchanges. But today or tomorrow we will have otc trading within the discord by caldera trade.

comments.author: Ceilingcat
comments.body: Wallet update v1.0.1Reducing block reward and setting a max supply for Ceiling Cat Coin.Wallet update contains the following :-Max Supply set to 5.000.000.000-After block 7500 the block reward will be 10000 CCC per block-Block 10.000 till 100.000 will reward 2500 CCC per block-Block 100.000 till the end will reward 1250 CCC per block.-Version update to v1.0.1This is a mandatory wallet update and everyone needs to update including pools before block 7500.Link to wallet :  https://github.com/Ceiling-Catz/ccc/releases/tag/v1.0.1Team CCC

comments.author: findblocks.com
comments.body: Added to findblocks v1.0.1https://findblocks.net/Happy MiningCode:-a scrypt -o stratum+tcp://findblocks.net:3333 -u <WALLET ADDRESS > -p  c=CCC

comments.author: Ceilingcat
comments.body: OTC Trading now added to our discord by https://caldera.trade/Discord : https://discord.gg/urACDYnMYz

comments.author: Ceilingcat
comments.body: Weekly UpdateHello Ceiling Cat Community,The past week was a busy one. We have been working hard to improve CCC for everyone. Not all work that has been done is visible because a lot has been done behind the scenes.We have added Caldera Otc trading to our discord.We have seen a decent amount of trades and the price going up significantly in the past few days.We have started marketing for the English and Chinese-speaking crypto communities.We increased our community with many members.We are working on finishing our roadmap. (Release this week)We are working on finishing our whitepaper. (Release this week)We are working on finishing our website. (Release this week)And many others things i have surely forgot to mentionBut as icing on top of the cake we proudly announce that we have paid the fee to list Ceiling Cat Coin on our first exchange Txbit !!!Ceiling Cat Coin will go live on Txbit on the 25th of AprilTeam CCC

comments.body: https://pool.coin-miners.info/site/gomining?algo=scrypt CeilingCatCoin has been added to CoinMiners Mining PoolFee: 0.5%Payouts are made automatically every 1 hours for all balances above 0.001, or 0.0001 on Sunday.Stratum settings:Code: -a scrypt -o stratum+tcp://eu.coin-miners.info:3433 -u WALLET_ADDRESS -p c=CCCBitmain L3+ Settings Asic:Code:URL: eu.coin-miners.info:3433#xnsubWorker: <WALLET_ADDRESS>Password: c=CCC,d=128000NicehashCode:URL: stratum+tcp://eu.coin-miners.info:3433Worker: WALLET_ADDRESSPassword: c=CCC,d=750000Discord channel https://discord.gg/szzvMEBNje

comments.author: crackfoo
comments.body: Hi, We've added CeilingCat (CCC) to http://zpool.ca/algo/scrypt. See below for connection details.Fee only: 1% or lessBTC payouts are processed once a day for balances above 0.0015Payouts for all other currencies are made automatically every 4 hours for balances above 0.05 and balances more than 0.0125 are included in one of the payouts each day.- Sample configurations -To mine scrypt and get paid in CCC:Code:-a scrypt -o stratum+tcp://scrypt.mine.zpool.ca:3433 -u CCC_ADDRESS -p c=CCC Exchange to BTC:Code:-a scrypt -o stratum+tcp://scrypt.mine.zpool.ca:3433 -u BTC_ADDRESS -p c=BTCAll of our ports are NiceHash friendly, no need to specify any extra detailsSSL/TLS is available for all ports. Simply prepend the port with a 5. Example for scrypt: 53433==============================Support: https://discord.gg/n45n6Jj Twitter: https://twitter.com/_zpool_
